item.title: BÃ i 6 - Kiá»ƒu Dá»¯ Liá»‡u Sá»‘ Number - LÃ m Chá»§ Sá»‘ Há»c JavaScript
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t

Nguá»“n: KhÃ³a há»c JavaScript - Kteam

ğŸ”¢ Number trong JavaScript

Number lÃ  kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘á»ƒ biá»ƒu diá»…n táº¥t cáº£ cÃ¡c loáº¡i sá»‘ trong JavaScript.

let integer = 42;              // Sá»‘ nguyÃªn
let decimal = 3.14;            // Sá»‘ tháº­p phÃ¢n
let negative = -17;            // Sá»‘ Ã¢m

console.log(typeof integer);   // "number"

ğŸš« GiÃ¡ trá»‹ Ä‘áº·c biá»‡t

NaN (Not a Number):

console.log(0 / 0);            // NaN
console.log("hello" * 5);      // NaN
console.log(isNaN(NaN));       // true

Infinity:

console.log(1 / 0);            // Infinity
console.log(-1 / 0);           // -Infinity

ğŸ§® Object Math 

console.log(Math.PI);          // 3.141592653589793
console.log(Math.round(4.7));  // 5 (lÃ m trÃ²n)
console.log(Math.floor(4.7));  // 4 (lÃ m trÃ²n xuá»‘ng)
console.log(Math.ceil(4.7));   // 5 (lÃ m trÃ²n lÃªn)
console.log(Math.max(1,2,3));  // 3
console.log(Math.min(1,2,3));  // 1

PhÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c tÃ­nh toÃ¡n:

ğŸ”„ Chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i sang Number 

let str = "123";
console.log(Number(str));      // 123
console.log(parseInt("123px")); // 123 
console.log(parseFloat("3.14kg")); // 3.14

console.log(Number(true));     // 1
console.log(Number(false));    // 0

ğŸ‹ï¸ BÃ i táº­p thá»±c hÃ nh 

// TÃ­nh BMI
let weight = 70;    // kg
let height = 1.75;  // m
let bmi = weight / Math.pow(height, 2);
console.log("BMI:", bmi.toFixed(1));

// Sá»‘ ngáº«u nhiÃªn tá»« 1-10
let random = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1;
console.log("Random:", random);

ğŸ† TÃ³m táº¯t

âœ… Number lÃ  kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u duy nháº¥t cho sá»‘
âœ… Math object cung cáº¥p háº±ng sá»‘ vÃ  phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c toÃ¡n há»c
âœ… NaN vÃ  Infinity lÃ  giÃ¡ trá»‹ Ä‘áº·c biá»‡t
âœ… Chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i báº±ng Number(), parseInt(), parseFloat()

item.title: BÃ i 7 - KhÃ¡i QuÃ¡t Kiá»ƒu Dá»¯ Liá»‡u Chuá»—i (String) - Xá»­ LÃ½ VÄƒn Báº£n
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t

Nguá»“n: KhÃ³a há»c JavaScript - Kteam

1. String trong JavaScript

String (chuá»—i) lÃ  kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘á»ƒ lÆ°u trá»¯ vÄƒn báº£n.

2. CÃ¡ch táº¡o String 

// Single quotes
let singleQuote = 'Hello World';

// Double quotes
let doubleQuote = "Hello World";

// Template literals (backticks)
let templateString = `Hello World`;
let multiLine = `DÃ²ng 1
DÃ²ng 2`;

console.log(typeof singleQuote); // "string"

3. Ná»‘i chuá»—i

CÃ¡ch 1: ToÃ¡n tá»­ + 

let firstName = "Nguyen";
let lastName = "Van A";
let fullName = firstName + " " + lastName;
console.log(fullName); // "Nguyen Van A"

CÃ¡ch 2: Template literals (khuyÃªn dÃ¹ng) 

let name = "John", age = 30;
let intro = `TÃ´i lÃ  ${name}, ${age} tuá»•i`;
console.log(intro); // "TÃ´i lÃ  John, 30 tuá»•i"

4. Thuá»™c tÃ­nh vÃ  phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c String

Äá»™ dÃ i chuá»—i: 

let text = "JavaScript";
console.log(text.length); // 10

Truy cáº­p kÃ½ tá»±: 

let word = "Hello";
console.log(word[0]);     // "H"
console.log(word.charAt(0)); // "H"
console.log(word[word.length - 1]); // "o"

5. TÃ¬m kiáº¿m trong chuá»—i 

let text = "JavaScript Programming";

// indexOf() - TÃ¬m vá»‹ trÃ­
console.log(text.indexOf("Script")); // 4
console.log(text.indexOf("Python")); // -1 (khÃ´ng tÃ¬m tháº¥y)

// includes() - Kiá»ƒm tra cÃ³ chá»©a
console.log(text.includes("Java"));  // true
console.log(text.includes("Python")); // false

// startsWith(), endsWith()
console.log(text.startsWith("Java")); // true
console.log(text.endsWith("ing"));    // true

6. Cáº¯t vÃ  thay Ä‘á»•i chuá»—i 

let text = "JavaScript Programming";

// Cáº¯t chuá»—i
console.log(text.substring(0, 10));  // "JavaScript"
console.log(text.slice(4, 10));     // "Script"

// Chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i hoa/thÆ°á»ng
console.log(text.toLowerCase());     // "javascript programming"
console.log(text.toUpperCase());     // "JAVASCRIPT PROGRAMMING"

// Loáº¡i bá» khoáº£ng tráº¯ng
let messyText = "  Hello World  ";
console.log(messyText.trim());       // "Hello World"

// Thay tháº¿
console.log(text.replace("Java", "Type")); // "TypeScript Programming"

7. TÃ¡ch chuá»—i 

let csv = "Apple,Banana,Orange";
let fruits = csv.split(",");
console.log(fruits); // ["Apple", "Banana", "Orange"]

let sentence = "Hello World";
let words = sentence.split(" ");
console.log(words); // ["Hello", "World"]

8. BÃ i táº­p nhá»

Xá»­ lÃ½ thÃ´ng tin ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng:

function processName(rawName) {
    return rawName
        .trim()
        .split(" ")
        .map(word => word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1).toLowerCase())
        .join(" ");
}

console.log(processName("  jOhN dOe  ")); // "John Doe"

Chá»‘t láº¡i:

BÃ i 7 giÃºp báº¡n hiá»ƒu vá» kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u String, cÃ¡ch táº¡o chuá»—i (single quotes, double quotes, template literals), ná»‘i chuá»—i, cÃ¡c phÆ°Æ¡ng thá»©c quan trá»ng nhÆ° length, charAt, indexOf, includes, substring, split, vÃ  cÃ¡ch xá»­ lÃ½ chuá»—i trong thá»±c táº¿.

ğŸ“š BÃ i tiáº¿p theo

ğŸ‘‰ BÃ i 8: Template Literals, Number-String - TÃ¬m hiá»ƒu sÃ¢u vá» template literals vÃ  chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i giá»¯a Number-String!

item.title: BÃ i 9 - Kiá»ƒu Dá»¯ Liá»‡u Boolean - Logic ÄÃºng/Sai Trong JavaScript
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t

Nguá»“n: KhÃ³a há»c JavaScript - Kteam

1. Boolean trong JavaScript

Boolean lÃ  kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u logic chá»‰ cÃ³ 2 giÃ¡ trá»‹:

  • true - ÄÃºng
  • false - Sai

2. CÃ¡ch táº¡o Boolean

Trá»±c tiáº¿p: 

let isActive = true;
let isComplete = false;
console.log(typeof isActive);  // "boolean"

Tá»« so sÃ¡nh: 

let age = 25, minAge = 18;
let isAdult = age >= minAge;    // true
let isChild = age < minAge;     // false

Tá»« hÃ m Boolean(): 

console.log(Boolean(1));       // true
console.log(Boolean(0));       // false
console.log(Boolean("hello")); // true
console.log(Boolean(""));      // false

3. Truthy vÃ  Falsy Values

Falsy Values (luÃ´n lÃ  false): 

console.log(Boolean(false));     // false
console.log(Boolean(0));         // false
console.log(Boolean(""));        // false
console.log(Boolean(null));      // false
console.log(Boolean(undefined)); // false
console.log(Boolean(NaN));       // false

Truthy Values (táº¥t cáº£ cÃ²n láº¡i): 

console.log(Boolean(1));         // true
console.log(Boolean("hello"));   // true
console.log(Boolean([]));        // true

4. ToÃ¡n tá»­ Logic

AND (&&) - Cáº£ hai pháº£i Ä‘Ãºng: 

let age = 25, hasLicense = true;
let canDrive = age >= 18 && hasLicense;  // true

OR (||) - Má»™t trong hai Ä‘Ãºng: 

let isWeekend = false, isHoliday = true;
let canRest = isWeekend || isHoliday;    // true

// Default values
let userName = null;
let displayName = userName || "KhÃ¡ch";  // "KhÃ¡ch"

NOT (!) - Äáº£o ngÆ°á»£c: 

let isLoggedIn = false;
let needsLogin = !isLoggedIn;  // true

// Chuyá»ƒn vá» boolean
console.log(!!"hello");  // true
console.log(!!0);        // false

5. Short-circuit Evaluation

&& - Dá»«ng khi gáº·p falsy: 

let user = { name: "John", profile: { email: "john@example.com" } };

// Safe navigation
console.log(user && user.profile && user.profile.email); // "john@example.com"

// Conditional execution
let isAdmin = true;
isAdmin && console.log("Welcome admin!");

|| - Dá»«ng khi gáº·p truthy: 

function greet(name) {
    name = name || "KhÃ¡ch";  // Default value
    console.log(`Xin chÃ o, ${name}!`);
}

greet("John");    // "Xin chÃ o, John!"
greet();          // "Xin chÃ o, KhÃ¡ch!"

6. So sÃ¡nh vá»›i cÃ¡c toÃ¡n tá»­

== vs ===: 

// Loose equality (==) - Type coercion  
console.log(true == 1);        // true
console.log(false == 0);       // true

// Strict equality (===) - No type coercion
console.log(true === 1);       // false
console.log(true === true);    // true

// Best practice: Always use ===
let isComplete = true;
if (isComplete === true) {  // âœ… Good
    console.log("Task completed");
}

7. BÃ i táº­p nhá»

Validate form Ä‘Äƒng kÃ½:

function validateUser(userData) {
    let email = userData.email || "";
    let password = userData.password || "";
    let age = userData.age || 0;
    let agreeTerms = userData.agreeTerms || false;
    
    let validEmail = email.includes("@") && email.length >= 5;
    let validPassword = password.length >= 8;
    let validAge = age >= 13 && age <= 120;
    let termsAccepted = agreeTerms === true;
    
    let isValid = validEmail && validPassword && validAge && termsAccepted;
    
    return {
        isValid: isValid,
        checks: { validEmail, validPassword, validAge, termsAccepted }
    };
}

let testUser = {
    email: "user@example.com",
    password: "MyPass123",
    age: 25,
    agreeTerms: true
};

console.log(validateUser(testUser));

Chá»‘t láº¡i:

BÃ i 9 giÃºp báº¡n hiá»ƒu vá» kiá»ƒu dá»¯ liá»‡u Boolean vá»›i 2 giÃ¡ trá»‹ true/false, Truthy/Falsy values, cÃ¡c toÃ¡n tá»­ logic (&&, ||, !), Short-circuit Evaluation, vÃ  sá»± khÃ¡c biá»‡t giá»¯a == vÃ  === trong so sÃ¡nh Boolean.

ğŸ“š BÃ i tiáº¿p theo

item.title: BÃ i 10 - Null vÃ Undefined - Hiá»ƒu RÃµ Sá»± KhÃ¡c Biá»‡t
item.author: nguyenwoong20@gmail.com (Nguyen)
item.description:
ğŸ¥ Video hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chi tiáº¿t

Nguá»“n: KhÃ³a há»c JavaScript - Kteam

1. Null vs Undefined - KhÃ¡i niá»‡m 

// Undefined - há»‡ thá»‘ng tá»± gÃ¡n
let notAssigned;
console.log(notAssigned); // undefined

// Null - láº­p trÃ¬nh viÃªn gÃ¡n cÃ³ chá»§ Ã½
let user = null;
console.log(user); // null

// So sÃ¡nh
console.log(typeof undefined);  // "undefined"
console.log(typeof null);       // "object" (bug lá»‹ch sá»­!)
console.log(undefined == null);   // true
console.log(undefined === null);  // false

2. Khi nÃ o xuáº¥t hiá»‡n?

Undefined xuáº¥t hiá»‡n: 

// Biáº¿n chÆ°a gÃ¡n giÃ¡ trá»‹
let notAssigned;
console.log(notAssigned); // undefined

// Truy cáº­p property khÃ´ng tá»“n táº¡i
let obj = { name: "John" };
console.log(obj.age); // undefined

// Function khÃ´ng return
function noReturn() { let x = 5; }
console.log(noReturn()); // undefined

Null Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n cÃ³ chá»§ Ã½: 

// Khá»Ÿi táº¡o biáº¿n sáº½ chá»©a object sau
let user = null;

// Reset giÃ¡ trá»‹ object
let data = { name: "John" };
data = null; // XÃ³a reference

// API response khÃ´ng cÃ³ dá»¯ liá»‡u
function findUser(id) {
    return null; // KhÃ´ng tÃ¬m tháº¥y
}

3. CÃ¡ch kiá»ƒm tra 

let value1;
let value2 = null;

// Kiá»ƒm tra cá»¥ thá»ƒ
console.log(value1 === undefined);    // true
console.log(value2 === null);         // true

// Kiá»ƒm tra cáº£ hai
console.log(value1 == null);          // true
console.log(value2 == null);          // true

// Nullish coalescing
console.log(value1 ?? "default");     // "default"
console.log(value2 ?? "default");     // "default"

4. Nullish Coalescing (??) vs Logical OR (||) 

let userName = "";
let userAge = 0;
let profile = null;

// Nullish coalescing (??) - chá»‰ thay null/undefined
console.log(userName ?? "Anonymous");    // "" (giá»¯ nguyÃªn)
console.log(userAge ?? 18);              // 0 (giá»¯ nguyÃªn)
console.log(profile ?? {});              // {} (thay tháº¿ null)

// Logical OR (||) - thay táº¥t cáº£ falsy values
console.log(userName || "Anonymous");    // "Anonymous"
console.log(userAge || 18);              // 18

5. Best Practices 

// âœ… Good practices
let user = null;              // Sáº½ chá»©a object sau
let userList = [];            // Máº£ng rá»—ng thay vÃ¬ null
let settings = {};            // Object rá»—ng thay vÃ¬ null

// Function vá»›i default parameters
function createPost(title = "Untitled", author = null) {
    return {
        title,
        author: author ?? "Anonymous",
        createdAt: new Date()
    };
}

// Check parameters
function processUser(userData) {
    if (userData === null || userData === undefined) {
        throw new Error("User data is required");
    }
    return { id: userData.id, name: userData.name ?? "Unknown" };
}

Chá»‘t láº¡i

  1. undefined: Há»‡ thá»‘ng tá»± gÃ¡n khi biáº¿n chÆ°a cÃ³ giÃ¡ trá»‹
  2. null: Láº­p trÃ¬nh viÃªn gÃ¡n cÃ³ chá»§ Ã½ Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘áº¡i diá»‡n “khÃ´ng cÃ³ Ä‘á»‘i tÆ°á»£ng”
  3. Kiá»ƒm tra: === cho specific, == null cho cáº£ hai
  4. Nullish coalescing (??): Chá»‰ thay tháº¿ null/undefined, giá»¯ nguyÃªn falsy values khÃ¡c
  5. Best practice: DÃ¹ng null cho object, [] cho array, "" cho string
